Bash(# Create the wallet directory for liamtrask
mkdir -p ~/.syft/gdrive/liamtrask_at_gmail_com

# Copy the credentials
cp ~/Downloads/credentials.json ~/.syft/gdrive/liamtrask_at_gmail_com/credentials.json

# Create account info
echo ''{""email"": ""liamtrask@gmail.com""}'' > ~/.syft/gdrive/liamtrask_at_gmail_com/account_info.json

echo ""âœ… Manually added liamtrask@gmail.com to wallet""
ls -la ~/.syft/gdrive/liamtrask_at_gmail_com/)
